website_summaries.verdict: Not your typical water bottle. Its features and design make it our top spot for the best on the market today.
pros: Extremely sleek design makes it super user-friendly
Double-walled construction works with both cold and hot drinks
Sweat-proof stainless steel and no BPA
cons: It's costlier than other water bottles we researched and only holds 17 ounces, but for all it has to offer, it's still a great buy

customer_reviews.title: Rubber band around the top is awful
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I wanted a small, stainless steal bottle for my 4 year old. I chose this one, but I cannot recommend it. There is a rubber band around the top. It falls out every time you wash this bottle. It is very hard to put back on. It also collects dish soap, so you have to rinse few times. During wash number five or six it broke in half and now the bottle is unusable because it leaks like crazy. This design needs to change. I am shipping it back. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: Leaks in/out of the inner space. Not sanitary.
customer_reviews.text: After using this bottle for about one month, I have noticed that there is water inside the inner wall. It’s INSIDE the vacuum sealed area. This does not seem sanitary or safe.
customer_reviews.author: Spaz

customer_reviews.title: Picture didn't match product
customer_reviews.text: I love the 9oz size and shape of these bottles for lunch box! The bottle looked nothing like the picture which is primarily purple with a nice short ombre (advertised). I called customer service and they were super nice and sent me another in case the print was wrong. Got the exact same again. I took a star away because the pictures do not necessarily reflect what you get! I am not confident in ordering another ombre one now. (I did order the wood looking one prior and it looks fabulous, so maybe I order that again). Forgot to mention the lid was dented too. No clue why, but that didn't big me nearly as much as the image mismatch.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 78148

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but maybe a little fragile
customer_reviews.text: Fits snugly in the drink holder in my Jeep Wrangler, keeps liquids at the desired temp for hours, and doesn't leak. - Update 8/11/2018 Downgraded from 5 stars to 3 today. After hand washing the bottle yesterday, I now have a rattle inside of the bottle. It sounds like something broke inside of it. I haven't dropped it or handled it roughly, and assuming this is not normal. I can't imagine what's rattling around in there. This isn't a glass thermos. Still, I'm wondering if it will work as well or leak...
customer_reviews.author: Steve Skinner

customer_reviews.title: What a letdown ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Highly anticipated a 34 oz because I live in a nursing home and I own two 17 Oz from other sources. One was a gift from mom that was purchased at a world sporting event. (Obviously higher quality. Wish I knew brand) One was a gift from a charity They both out preformed the one i purchased from this company. in the cold. I filled the amethyst from this company with ice at about 7am from my nurse. By 6:00pm same day it was all melted and slightly cool water. My old ones had 30% ice 24 hrs later. Haven’t tested heat yet. Room temperature was 74*F
customer_reviews.author: Marc M

customer_reviews.title: WOW Better than a YETTI for half the price
customer_reviews.text: WOW Better than a YETTI for half the price! Worth every penny! While on vacation in Mexico I had left it directly in the hot sun on the beach for a couple of hours in the sand. I picked it up and the bottle was hot to the touch. I figured the water had to be hot! Nope it was still cold. Unfortunately I left it in Mexico by accident immediately came back home and purchased 2 more. I got one for my kids to keep their drinks cold for school! One for me to take to the gym...Nothing like cold water after a work out! A must have for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fold by the ombré pattern!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this product. Purchased the glacier ombré pattern and instead of the two colors blending together in the middle there is a distinct line between them so looks very awkward and odd. Have bought the tumbler version of this brand in a solid shimmery white which is nice but they need to make their ombré patterns look more like the pictures. Returned immediately and bought a Mira water bottle instead which is much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Amcooper2006

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented, but otherwise beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have three other Simple Modern Bolt bottles, so I already know them to be of good quality. I got this one to replace my Manna bottle (after two Mannas in a row starting to rattle, I’m done with them!). Unfortunately, it arrived dented. I’m keeping it to see if the dent has affected the bottle’s insulation (since these bottles are vacuum sealed). The color is beautiful! It has a pearlescent effect to it that is not overpowering. I would call it “classically understated.” Heheh All in all, I like my bottle. Just hoping that it can keep my water C-C-C-COLD!
customer_reviews.author: adil_shujaat@yahoo.com

customer_reviews.title: Dents easily; not entirely insulated
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle has bean beat up by my kindergartener and I find that it dents and scratches rather easily compared to our other (S'well included) bottles. I'm also unsure about the insulation as it seems the exterior runs cooler than our other stainless steel water bottles when we are carting around cold drinks. The ice cubes that I put in there also seem to melt faster than the same amount of ice cubes that I place in my other child's stainless steel water bottle for school. But my child loves the designs and the 9 oz size is perfect for a kindergartener.
customer_reviews.author: GE-79

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!! Keeps cold and leakproof.
customer_reviews.text: I work as a field social worker and reside in the desert. I needed a bottle that would keep my water ice cold especially in the summer since the temps are always 110+. I ordered this bottle because my other ones leaked all the time. Several coworkers have similar bottles. I was originally drawn to the colors (and added my own decal). I am so impressed. Not only does this bottle not leak my water stays cold, that’s right COLD for 48 hours even without ice cubes. This is definitely the best one. Yes it’s smaller than I would like (32oz and up don’t fit in cup holders) I’m still extremely pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Socalgirl2007

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Stuff Cool or Warm, But...
customer_reviews.text: LEAKS. It leaks all over. The first time it happened, I thought I filled it too high, but no. I haven't been filling it and it leaks. It leaked in my bag, water all over my laptop, portable hard drive, phone, etc. On top of that, it is difficult to clean and does hold smells. I'm just waiting on it to rust. I ordered three of the large ones- two as gifts. All have the same issues. Wouldn't purchase again. Read the manufacturer's warranty.... so they expect issues after 90 days?
customer_reviews.author: Golden Fennex

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Does this style of hot/cold bottle keep your liquid hot or cold? You bet it does! It is not “stylish”, it does not have a special carry handle, and it does not have a special mouthpiece. But this double-walled stainless bottle with a screw-on cap truly does keep your beverage hot or cold for at least 24 hours. We have a multitude of bottles in our cupboard that we have acquired over the years, but none of them work as efficiently as this style does. What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Casa Grande

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: I have had many bottles like this one over the years. My biggest test of this line is to see if it keeps my ice water cold with the ice still unmelted in my car on a hot day. I did that & in 1 hour it melted the ice. NOT HAPPY ABOUT THAT! I have NEVER had a issue with any other brand except this one. Was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine70

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for almost 5 months and its amazing. It keeps my coffee hot and warm for a very long time; longer than I expected. I have also dropped it a few times and there hasn't been any dents. My only thing but it's not a big deal is that it holds onto the smell of my coffee; I have washed it countless times and it still smells like coffee. The good thing is that I am only using it to drink coffee or hot chocolate and not really water unless I have to. Overall, good buy and I would buy another or for someone who loves coffee on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Shadora Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Effective and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how they did it but these bottles are amazingly effective at keeping liquids cold or warm. I use them mostly for cold water and the water is still cold after multiple hours. I use them when driving, hiking, and flying. When flying, I empty it before going through security and then look for water bottle refill stations on the other side. Help me save our planet from the onslaught of plastic water bottles and get some of these amazing bottles for yourself and your friends--an awesome gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle for pre k lunchbox but not glittery
customer_reviews.text: We got the small bottle for my daughter for school. Easy to clean. She threw it from our second floor porch. It dented and scratched some paint, but it survived! So it’s durable if anything. My daughter was disappointed that it was not sparkly or glittery. The photos definitely look like they are supposed to be glittery. So she was disappointed but got over it. So, based on the photo of the listing, I don't think this water bottle is exactly described by the seller but it's still a good water bottle with a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Adair

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle ever!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite! Unfortunately I lost my original in the San Jose CA airport. We contacted lost and found to try and get it back. No such luck. I ordered a replacement, not realizing it was a different brand. Big mistake! I have since ordered two more of these. I fill them up in the morning before work. I throw some ice in there and the liquid is still cold and often still ice at the end of the day. If I put enough ice in the bottle the ice will last over night.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: Better than Thermos brand!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an insulated water bottle to keep water warm for my baby’s formula on the go. Read the many good reviews on this brand and decided to buy it. I was not disappointed! Kept his water warm/hot for long periods of time while we were out and about. I had even purchased the Thermos brand before this bottle but that warmer never kept the water as warm as Simple Modern. Also love the sleek shape and design, and it fits well in our diaper bag. I will keep buying Simple Modern for all my insulated water bottle needs!
customer_reviews.author: agnes s.

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 12/22 Simple Modern reached out to me and refunded (via amazon gift card) the defective bottles . I believe Simple Modern is striving to be a good company and I greatly appreciate their kind gesture, for this the company gets 4 stars. I ordered 2 fusion 17 oz bottles for 40 USD and both were dented on the sides and bottems. Waste of time and money. Never again I'll stick with Mira and contigo.
customer_reviews.author: DWA

customer_reviews.title: Love the Midnight Black
customer_reviews.text: Lost my first Simple Modern 9 oz stainless steel bottle, so I bought another. Stainless steel was sold out, so I bought the midnight black. It’s a smooth, shiny sparkly metallic black, so if you’re looking for a plain shiny or matte black, don’t get the midnight black. Works great like my previous Simple Modern bottle. The 9 oz fits my purse, backpack and totes without taking up lots of room and because of its short size, isn’t as susceptible to being knocked over when it’s in my desk like my 17 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it but..
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is beautiful! But there is absolutely no grip especially with the larger sized bottles. Mine slipped out of my hand onto a hard floor the second day I had it and dented so badly that I can't use it anymore because it won't stand up right when i set it down. It would be good to sell some sort of sleeve for grip in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Marcee W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle, almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This minimalistic bottle is so close to being perfect. It keeps the water cold for an entire day, looks good, feels good in the hand, etc. The only downside has to do with how the cap is designed and how it keeps humidity between the bottle mouth and the cap itself. That little gap is exposed and it creates that humidity smell you get when you put a wet glass facing down on a table, and then grab it to use after a day and it smells like crap. I got on the habit of rinsing the bottle mouth and cap every time I refill it, not a big deal, but also not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Will keep coffee hot all day. Keeps coffee isolated from air so it's fresh. After pouring my cup, I pour the rest of the pot into this after pre-heating the thermos w/ hot water for 3-4 minutes. Keeps coffee hot and fresh all day, and the coffeemaker can be shut off. Useful for those who like coffee throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: GLW

customer_reviews.title: Highly Highly Highlyyyy Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this brand! I’ve owned countless of bottles throughout my life and each one broke easily, leaked and cracked but this brands products are SOLID. I kept some juice in here the same temperature as it was in the fridge and hours later it was still cool. Likewise with tea. 3 hours later it finally started to become drinkable without burning my tongue. Highly Highly Highlyyyy recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water bottle to capatilize on the price compared to hydro flasks and swell bottles. It has feld up perfectly to my needs. It keeps liquid cold and warm, no matter which you choose. It is dishwasher safe and the cap secures very well (no leakage at all). The designs are very cute- I got the white marble and it looks exactly like it does it does in the picture. My water bottle was in perfect condition when it arrived (no dents.) I am very happy with this water bottle and highly recommend it for anyone looking for a high quality yet fashionable water bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Miller

customer_reviews.title: "Simple" bottle at best
customer_reviews.text: Dropped the water bottle on our asphalt driveway and put a major dent into the bottom of the bottle which now, causes the bottle to sit unbalanced and rocks. Also, on both of our water bottles, the black plastic part on the caps, have somehow disconnected from the stainless cap and now make it useless for my kids to use (the same effect as a safety cap on a medicine bottle). I understand that these bottles aren't impervious to accidents, but I just expected a little bit more durability, esp the caps.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: I find the 17 oz water bottle to be the perfect size. Any smaller or bigger would have made it inconvienent. The thing is it does get scratched easily. I had received 3 days ago and I already have some scratches where the metal bottom piece meets the colored area. Then again, I do walk around all day in a college campus so it is bond to fall or wear due to use. I put it inside my backpack and so far there are no leaks! The inside of the cap does have some plastic so it is not all stainless steel. Overall I am pretty happy about the product. I just need to be careful not to drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Best water bottle ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 25oz rose gold bolt bottle and couldn't be happier with it! It's great quality and looks great. I was afraid it would scratch easily but it doesn't. I put ice in it in the morning and it lasts all day, even in the car in the Texas heat! It stays cold overnight too. I'm ordering another one. I'm in love with it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Forester

customer_reviews.title: Best one used
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Xmas present for my husband and it was way better than I expected. He says it keeps his drinks super cold all day, he's had a few and this one is my far his favorite. The wood design on it hasn't scratched up and he's banged it around quite a bit since he works construction. Will definitely repurchase once he needs another and am definitely going to get one for myself lol only thing is k would definitely purchase on eofnthe cleaning brushes for this since it isn't dishwasher safe and hard to handwash. Besides that, it's been great!
customer_reviews.author: Mireya

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 5 months ago and used it occasionally- it kept cold things cold, hot things hot, so far so good. I always hand wash it. A few weeks ago the rubber ring on the cap started coming off when I unscrewed the cap. Then it came off every time I unscrewed it, finally now it came off and has disappeared. The cap no longer seals the way it should. Trust me, I did not put this thing to heavy use - and it still didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kipfer

customer_reviews.title: HELPS ME REACH MY DAILY WATER CONSUMPTION GOAL
customer_reviews.text: I am committed to drinking filtered water from a non-plastic container, due to the potential for contaminates. I bought a 34 oz Simple Modern Wave. The water tastes fresh and cool, even though I leave it at room temperature. It doesn't leak, as the lid seals tightly, and there are no issues with condensation, as it's well insulated. The large size makes it easy to reach my daily water consumption goal. The large size is on the bulky side, but worth it for me as I only carry it from my car to my office typically.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie DeStefano

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase! I’ve never had a vacuum water bottle before and now finding out what I was missing on. Great price, great size, fits perfectly into my backpack and keeps water cool for hours. Based on previous reviews, I’ve been careful to only put water in my bottle so far. Design is really cute and overall sleek look. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Abby J

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for the stage (he's a singer and performer) so to eliminate the water bottle problem - it' the perfect size for his man-purse that he wears - and that's what made me realize it's the perfect size for people who carry purses! fits right in my purse and now I always have access to water. I took it on Amtrak and there actually is a fountain that is safe to drink - so I had more water than usual while traveling! Now I bought them for a bunch of friends - it's a nice little gift!
customer_reviews.author: EastCoastMusicLover

customer_reviews.title: Water doesn't taste right
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is beautiful, I really like how it looks and I have received many compliments about it. It keeps the water (so far I only use for water) cold for long period of time and the price is right. But it gives the water an after taste that I don't get in any of my water bottles. It's a metallic taste. Since I just get it , I will rewash it several times again to see if that will fade away, otherwise I will have to return it
customer_reviews.author: TERESA

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Water Bottle in a Stunning, Durable Design!
customer_reviews.text: Love these water bottles! We have one for every member of our family (each a different design) They all look amazing, keep water cold forever, are durable, and are so easy to drink out of compared to widemouth bottles! What more could you want? If there is a drawback it would be that some of the bottles are really big (so pay attention to what size you order). We have dropped these bottles more times than I can count, and they all still look brand new. It is so nice to have a bottle that works equally well on the athletic field and in the office meeting. I have mine with me day and night.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Cute water bottle. Stays cold long time.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bolt water bottle. The color is so pretty, a good size and good value. I filled up with water and ice in the early morning and it's still really cold with ice at my Lunch time. I thought 17oz would be too small but it's actually perfect size. Fits in car cup holder and easy to hold and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy c.

customer_reviews.title: Shimmering Black Steel 17oz
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the 17oz (for me) and the 25oz (for my mom). The 25oz is large, but it is the perfect size for my mom who is retired and travels via car or hangs at home. I travel to work via public transportation so I didn't want to lug around a giant bottle. The 17oz is the perfect size for to me travel with - just a little larger than the average bottle. I also thought it was matte black but it sparkles in the sun :) I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bottle so much, I purchased a second one in a different color. I've had several Swell bottles, but somehow lost them while traveling. These are half the cost and are just as fantastic. It fits nicely in my cup holder in my car and is large enough to last me through a 30 min treadmill running session. And let's be honest; I may have smuggled wine on to the beach in mine. Easily the best water bottle I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great insulation, minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after buying a Simple Modern tumbler, which is fantastic. The bottle is generally good in terms of its shape, seal, and insulation properties. The edge of the lip is so severe as to be almost sharp and I wish the design were more like the curve/rolled edge of the tumbler. If it's possible to curve the lip a bit more while preserving the seal, that would improve the overall design.
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: 90 day Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this water bottle on March 18, 2020. According to the manufacturer it has a stainless steel lining inside. In July I noticed brown spots on the bottom inside the bottle which appear to be rust. The spots could not be cleaned with a bottle brush. I used this bottle for water only. I contacted Simple Modern and was informed that their products only have a 90 day warranty. Simple Modern wouldn't replace the bottle but did offer me a 10% discount on another purchase. The first one didn't last 4 months without becoming unhealthy to use, why would I buy another problem product?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this water bottle!  Took it on 10 day European tour!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, price, durability, design, etc. My daughter spent hours trying to find her perfect water bottle for a 10 day European Tour, and she chose this one. She recently returned from her trip, and was extremely pleased with this item. (Fit in her travel crossbody purse, leak proof, lots of patterns/colors to choose from, ice fit in opening, etc) Would definitely purchase again! Thank you (from Oklahoma)
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bottle, but seal ringkeeps getting lost
customer_reviews.text: So this bottle looks great and keeps water nice and cold. I got it for my 4th grader and within the first couple days, the clear seal around the screw-top fell off and got lost. Customer service was great and they promptly sent me a new one but after a couple weeks the same thing happened......So we still use it but it will leak if it tips over onto it's side while in his backpack. I wouldn't buy it again for this reason but not sure if an adult would have the same issue....
customer_reviews.author: Asha0325

customer_reviews.title: Peeling paint
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter because she loved the colors. It keeps her drink cool, with no keaking. Unfortunately after only 2 weeks of light use, its peeling. Flaking off like paint. I bought one last year from a differant vender (anature) It's still perfect with no peeling even after daily use.
customer_reviews.author: AzSunflower

customer_reviews.title: poor cap fit, loose seal ring
customer_reviews.text: The cap's threads do not mate well with the bottle, and it is difficult to screw on and off. The seal is a rubbery ring which is loosely installed on the cap, and arrived twisted. After I straightened it out, it fits better, but will likely just fall off at some point. The interior is steel except for the cap, which has some unknown sort of plastic in contact with the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Good for hot/cold water for hours!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store either cold water or hot water. I believe hot water lasts just slightly longer than the cold water, but not noticeable. It is nice and compact and doesn't spill. Good to keep in the car to have nice cold water during the summer without worrying about leaching from the plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed because my husband got this in the wood grain finish and it’s beautiful and keeps water cold for HOURS, so I decided to order one for myself. This came with a dent on the bottom and the paint is already chipping in a few places (see photos). The design has a weird dragging effect in several spots, which isn’t a huge deal and the design is still really pretty, but if I’m paying almost $20 for a water bottle, it shouldn’t come with a dent in the bottom and paint chipping...
customer_reviews.author: Nicola Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous as bedside carafe
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of the 17oz bottles in a beautiful marbled blue color that matches our bedroom. The first night my husband knocked his over. No problem for once, compared to his usual large glass of ice water. The next morning he was going on about how great it was to have ice cold water when he woke up with a dry throat at 5am. Neck fits our ice cubes perfectly. Great to have such a pretty option. Update - also bought a 9oz for my purse, great to have a product I trust not to leak!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Barber

customer_reviews.title: No Sparkle in Color
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try one of these in place of paying for a Swell. It seems like a quality bottle. I will say I put some ice in my water from my fridge dispenser and it melted right away in the bottle. The pictures of the Tropical Sea color in various sizes gave me the impression it would sparkle or have some glitter on it. It does not. It's plain purple and seafoam - no Sparkle. I gave it three stars because I felt the pictures were misleading on the bottle colors. The 34 oz will not fit in standard cup holders either which I did read in the info before I purchased it but just confirming in my review.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea N.

customer_reviews.title: But I hate trying to carry the little airline water bottle I ...
customer_reviews.text: I always feel dehydrated when traveling. But I hate trying to carry the little airline water bottle I get, particularly since I know the plastic is breaking down with each use. So, I gave this 12 oz bottle a try. It takes up a bit of room in my purse and adds some weight, so I was skeptical. But then I took a sip out of it, and the water was still ICE cold. Any doubts were literally washed away. There’s really nothing like cold water when you’ve been walking and are warm. I honestly can’t recommend this product enough.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A. Cloos

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Snugly fits in a side pocket of my purse. It's good quality, I didn't expect excellence at the price. I've a larger one from a different company that does have a easier to clean gasket seal but their equally effective preventing leaks. I really wanted one to fit that umbrella pocket & it does.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, durable water bottle
customer_reviews.text: These are almost too good! The first time I used it was for a 5 hour kayak trip in Florida, I ran out of water so I set the bottle in the full sun to melt the ice, after about 2 hours the bottle its self was burning hot to the touch, but only had about a teaspoon of water melted. Another day my hubs left his in the car all day at work, when he got in his car after 5pm he said the temp inside was around 118°, his bottle STILL had ice and cold water! I highly recommend these bottles, I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: LMB

customer_reviews.title: Great little bottle, holds up to the name brands. Very Stylish.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small stainless steel bottle for my desk and around the house. I love this. The rose gold sparkling is so pretty and its the perfect size. It has a small opening and a screw on cap. Keeps my drinks cold for a really long time and easy to clean with a silicone brush or in the dishwasher. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my kids and they love it! They are great for school and perfect fit for their smaller hands. Plus there are so many colors to choose from. When to Disney in the hot hot sun for 8 hours and there was still ice in it, even after refilling several times!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Arrived with a broken seal and so it leaked water.
customer_reviews.author: JoShmo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product I've already started recommending this to my friends
customer_reviews.text: I personally don't get to do reviews all that often. But when I come across an item that out reforms what I've read I am completely impressed. I received the flask rinsed it out put ice in it went to bed I got up to find but the ice was maybe only 2 to 5% melted. It is now mostly through the next day and the ice is maybe only 25% melted. I recommend this plask to anybody was looking for long-term storage a cold liquids.
customer_reviews.author: awesome. can't stop playing

customer_reviews.title: Spillproof and keeps my drinks cold!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I still had some water and ice in it from school yesterday over 24 hours ago and I can still hear ice in it when I shake it! So that’s incredible Print quality is amazing and I love that’s it’s portable and compact! Very happy with this. It’s tipped upside down in my backpack before and didn’t spill. I can’t speak on how long it stays cold, but it stayed cold long enough for a 6 hour day at college
customer_reviews.author: SAMANTHA

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This styled bottle I purchased was great! There is some of the wrap peeling from the top but not noticeable when the cap is on. I did order one of these cups in a different style and has a big scratch on the side of it. Purchased it on sale and would only purchase on sale and not full price.
customer_reviews.author: Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to clean. Hand wash, which is fine by us. It is a good size for holding. Attractive. The only down side is that while it is supposed to keep things cold 28 hours, after about 5 hours the liquid is already getting warmer. I recommend using ice in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad A. Bigam

customer_reviews.title: Love this bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottle. I use this one for water. It keeps things cold and fresh for a long time. The only thing I would say and why I only gave it 4 stars is because the powder coating tends to mark easy. The mark did come straight out when I washed it but it makes me uneasy putting it in my bag. I wrap it in a tea towel now to prevent it from getting scratched. The product was delivered on time and was packaged nicely. The color was exactly as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong one, but it's love
customer_reviews.text: So, I ordered my mom one print and a completely different one came...like different colors and style of the "print". But, my mom LOVES it and said she likes it more than the one I did order. So at least we are good in that department. It's the blue on top and purple on bottom and it's shimmery in the sun. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and cute
customer_reviews.text: I just received this water bottle in the mail, so I took pictures of how it arrived. It's a good size bottle considering its price and what it claims to do for your drinks. I noticed that on the lid there is some tiny chipping on it where the stainless steel appears to be coming off. Just like any other product you use to consume things with, I'd advise to look at the bottle first and clean it to make sure nothing gets in your drink accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: Julisa

customer_reviews.title: Love and On #2 in my collection!
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the hand wash but I only use for water, so it’s ok. My friend purchased this brand for me at Christmas and after 3 months in love, I have bought number 2. Slm does very well with the cold beverages (have not tried warm) despite hours in a hot car or sitting overnight. It also slides down in my laptop bag and I don’t have to worry about it spilling/leaking. Pleased and will add to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bottle. Drinks stay cold (I haven’t tried hot) for hours. I went on a cruise a few weeks ago and took my bottle along to avoid having to buy disposable bottles, and it did not disappoint. I filled it early in the morning with ice water, and the water was still ice cold 12 hours later, despite being in the sun and in a hot backpack most of the day. I plan on buying more for family members who use reusable bottles.
customer_reviews.author: John T Hill IV

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold ice for 24 hours--even with the bottle in fridge! I have a bottle from Walmart with ice that has ice remaining after 5 days. Will not purchase again. I wish Walmart carried the bottle I love but it has been discontinued in store.
customer_reviews.author: LCH

customer_reviews.title: I love this bottle except for one thing...
customer_reviews.text: ...It won't hold 16oz because of how the inside of the lid is made. Not a big deal really, but this is a review. I love everything else about it so far though. I've had it less than a week, but so far, so good. Great quality. It keeps my water cold, and fits well in my hand. I got the Robin Egg Blue, and it is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl T.

customer_reviews.title: Great little bottle!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a large stainless steel water bottle that doesn't fit in his lunchbox; he keeps it on his desk at school. This little 9 oz. bottle fits in the side mesh pocket of his lunchbox & keeps his water cold for over five hours until his lunch period. He likes it & drinks more water now. It's easy to clean & so far it has not leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy B

customer_reviews.title: cap dents very easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the bottle, i have one in 500 ml, 750 ml, and the 1L bottle. They all keep drinks cold for several hours (I have not tried hot, but I am looking forward to doing that too), and they hold a good volume without being bulky or obtrusive. What annoyed me is that the 750 ml bottle go knocked off my (very low) coffee table onto the floor and the cap dented. it still closes without leaks, but for a fall from a height of 17 inches, that seems flimsy-ish.
customer_reviews.author: Saba

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized water bottle. We needed something that wouldn't melt when my husband was working at the forge and this is great. Keeps his water cold even with external heat. Top screws on well. Neck a bit narrow but can be cleaned with appropriate sized brush.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bottle prone to dents
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this water bottle! I got the pink and blue one and I always get so many compliments on the lovely powdered ombré color. It does dent easily so don’t drop it! Mine is dented at the bottom and now it’s wobbly and doesn’t stand up straight. No big deal, but something to think about if you’re clumsy like me! This bottle keeps liquid cold for a long time. Haven’t tried hot liquids but I would assume it would work well for that too given the insulation. It’s Heavy, but perfect for a car ride, picnic, or short hike.
customer_reviews.author: ADWRB

customer_reviews.title: Stays hot for 12 hours and cold for 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: We don’t purchase bottled water anymore because we have a water softener in the whole house. So we just fill up these insulated bottles with cold water and the stay cold for 24 hours. Hot product will stay hot for 12 hours. Super easy to clean and all the colors are cute too. I love them all I have about 4 in my collection now and can’t wait to buy more Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Monique Simpson

customer_reviews.title: BEST Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is the best one I've purchased, which I did after reading the other reviews, thankfully. I'm only using my 17oz bottle for water, but it seriously keeps it at the same temperature, no matter if it's been filled with icy cold water and sitting in the hot sun in the car, or if I have room temp water and it's been in the freezing Chicago weather. Holds the temp of what you put in there. Excellent product, and love that it's 18/8 food grade stainless steel. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Like the size. It came with a coupon for an extra lid for free. I tried to use the coupon and was unable to use it. On the purchase check out there was no place to use the coupon. That needs to be rectified or don’t include the coupon with the water bottle. I’m trying to get away from plastic water bottles and think this will help.
customer_reviews.author: P. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store my diluted oral care solution for my water pik. I needed a cat-proof bottle because one of my cats loves pushing things off my vanity. It is attractive, easy to clean, and well made. The gasket on the stopper works well to tightly seal the bottle. I have no doubt it will retain the seal when repeatedly dropped or kicked around. So far it has survived being pushed off my vanity with only minor scratches.
customer_reviews.author: ilyandra

customer_reviews.title: The bottles were the perfect thing to customize with vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Purchased both the wave and the wide mouth bottle for family gifts for a marathon. The bottles were the perfect thing to customize with vinyl. They keep ice cubes and liquid cold for over 24 hours and hot liquid hot/warm for over 12 (actually I don't know exactly how long since I finished the drink before it was cold). The bottle don't leak and are very sturdy, even after an accidental drop. Solid insulated bottle for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M DeGonge

customer_reviews.title: Good water bottle pay attention to your order
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are great. BUT I thought I ordered one in wood grain, one in mint and one sparkly pink and I received 3 bottles in the color “freedom”. Somehow this is user error as my order on amazon says 3 freedom, but that’s not a color I chose when I hit “add to cart”. This is for our Easter baskets so there is no time to return and replace, but watch your order and make sure it selects to pattern you want. Now I’m stuck with 3 bottles in a pattern no one likes. And we won’t be able to tell who’s bottle is whose 🤦🏼‍♀️🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Newman

customer_reviews.title: keeps drinks cold, exterior coating doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thought, works well at keeping drinks cold. My concern would be how long it lasts, the paint scratches easily and I don't think it'd handle being dropped well. If you are rough with bottles or drop things I'd suggest getting a non painted one/stainless exterior (if that's even offered)
customer_reviews.author: Emma. H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing temp control
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend much more than 10 or 12 dollars on a water bottle since they always seems to break or eventually leak. I decided to spend a bit more for the features on this one (rather than 35 or more for a name brand) and couldn't be happier! The first day I took it to work and left water in it overnight. I came into my office the next day and the water was still cold! I don't plan to use it for anything hot, but the insultation for cold drinks alone is worth it to me!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. It's easy to clean and it's leak proof. It keeps the temperature of the beverage for long time. I just wish the exterior surface wasn't made so smooth. It's very slippery and difficult to hold when wash it.
customer_reviews.author: xiaotuma

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Tried this out for the first week and I have no complaints. It’s easy to hold and I have been receiving a lot of compliments on my orange bottle. The mouth isn’t too big so it’s easy to drink water without spilling on yourself. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Love These Water Bottles!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th Simple Modern water bottle I’ve bought because my family loves them so much. I walk five miles every day (more in the Summer), so I’m always on the go with one of my water bottles. Everyone in my family has one...even the dog! They’re very durable, don’t rust like some other brands & no issues with leaking at the cap either. Plus you can’t beat the price & the great selection of colors!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Okay bottle, smelly lid/cap
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, weight, aesthetics, and insulation of this water bottle. However, the cap always gets a mildew smell on it even after I wash it and leave it to dry out with the lid off overnight. I guess you need to remove the little plastic ring on the inside of the cap (though I'm not sure how much this even helps), but it seems like an unnecessary step and poor design. If I could do it again, I would have bought a different water bottle instead.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks even prettier in person
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. I've been recently obsessed with water bottles, and use them daily at work. The color on this is gorgeous, and it keeps my water cold all day. I can't confirm how long it stays cold, because I drink a lot of water, so it isn't sitting a long time. However, it does stay cold at least during my 8-10 hour work shift. I love this brand, and have purchased at least 5 more bottles from Simple Modern.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not the best thermos I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the price is great and the design is amazing! But unfortunately, it does not keep my hot drinks warm for longer than maybe one hour if I am lucky. I also bought the rose gold colored bottle and let me tell you it's really just millennial pink. It is not rose gold in the slightest. So needless to say, I am disappointed in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgieanneP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hand problems
customer_reviews.text: Easier for me to hold and open, absolutely perfect and holds plenty for your needs. Two of these and you are good for the day, three full ones and you have your allotted water for the day! Better then using a gallon jug!!
customer_reviews.author: CarCar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! So happy to have it.
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this bottle! We’ve bought four of them and there has been no flaws. It even keeps the ice frozen for more than 10 hours. No leaking, no sweating, we’ve purchased them in different occasions and will continue to do so cause’ we use them so much and for different purposes, my husband keeps his coffee and it does not cool , my son takes it to school so his juice or water is still cold for break time, and i love to carry my COLD water everywhere. This product is by far the best we have tried in its category.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Quintero Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect to add ice for lasting cold beverages
customer_reviews.text: Cannot put ice cubes inside. I bought a super small ice cube tray and they still did not fit. I will note that once the water is cold, the temperature lasts about 2 hours... but you cannot fit Any ice cubes in the tiny neck of this
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: ... husband because he wouldn't stop stealing mine because he liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my husband because he wouldn't stop stealing mine because he liked it so much! I love how cold it keeps my water during the day! I keep a pitcher of water in the fridge and use it to fill my bottle during the day. Even if I only fill it once and leave it out all day, the water is just as cold as it was straight from the fridge 12 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few weeks... But then...
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first. But a month later the lid starts losing air pretty badly. Squeaks loudly when opening and makes hissing and whistling sound all through the night. Can't deal with it anymore. Never put in dishwasher. Hand washed only.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought several of these bottles and normally have nothing but good things to say. This one was unfortunately different. When the bottle arrived it was not speckled as shown and then was horribly scratched after the first use. The other bottle i ordered in another color is still in perfect condition weeks later. Hoping it was a fluke because we love this product. They keep water cold all day as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Micah S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have several styles of water bottles/mugs and this Simple Modern 17oz is one of the top ones! It is leak proof, perfect size for my bag and keeps water cool for long periods. I tried it with 1/4 full of ice and filled rest with water. After 12 hrs some ice was left and after 24 hrs was still refreshingly cool. Design makes it a little more 'fun' to have a water bottle. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: David at beach

customer_reviews.title: Great, if it works
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 of these and while the first one arrived with a big dent in the bottom, it still works fine, so I kept it. I ordered two more and they arrived in pristine shape, but one of them does not insulate well, if at all. The dented one kept ice for over 48 hours. The non-working one kept it for 3 hours. They are great bottles and in beautiful colors, but sadly there have been issues with 2 of the 3 bottles. By the time I have the time and energy to deal with returning the one that doesn't work, it seems I am past the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work but wrong color!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to take to a convention for water and it seems to hold water at cooler temps for a little while. Certainly not all day though. Hard to fit ice cubes in there and a little hard to clean if you dont have a bottle brush. I gave 2 stars because the bottle I ordered is the right color but the white specks are missing!! The colors are a little off too.. doesnt look like the one I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations - Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are amazing. I bought one and then my husband wanted one a few weeks later. They are both great quality and truly do keep your water cold! I joke that it makes the water taste better. I bought an OXO long handle bottle brush to clean it and it works great! I’ve never owned a swell bottle, but I can’t see how spending $35 more would give you such a different result. Love the range of colors!
customer_reviews.author: Allison FTM FTWTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I have been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for just the right bottle that I can take inside while in group settings, activities that I do not have to worry about it spilling or leaking if knocked over. I have found such a bottle in this one. It stays perfectly cold. I have another one I bought at a local store and in 10 mins it is warm and not cold. I love the color choices too! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AMD

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good enough product, but the color is not what I was hoping for. I always expect some difference from the photos, especially with greens being so hard to photograph. I ordered the “moonlight” ombre, but instead of an ombre gradient from black to green, it’s more half-green, half black instead of the gradual fade.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: It keeps the water cold
customer_reviews.text: It does keep the water cold for more than 24 hours even if I leave it out in the car the entire day. The bottle fits in my cupholder so it is not that wide from the bottom. It feels well made and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product! Not only did it arrive shockingly quickly, but it's so pretty! Water from the tap gets cold quickly when I put it in the fridge and stays cold while I drink it (have not used for hot liquids). Sleek, pretty and hasn't leaked at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alysia M Herman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I love Simple Modern. It's so much nicer than Hydroflask, in terms of design and price. I noticed so many people say their bottle came bent or rusty, but that's never been the case for me. The 25oz is perfect, it's a good size that can last through a typical work day and it's cute. The color is nice and pretty, and the "bolt" style is definitely more clean and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: 5 STAR BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Simple Modern bottle and I have to admit I love them. First, I appreciate having multiple sizes to choose from. Sometimes I need 25 oz to take to the gym and other times I need 17 oz for the drive to work. Second, I love the huge selection of colors and patterns to choose from. There is something for every personality. And lastly, and of course most important...THE BOTTLE KEEPS BEVERAGES COLD.
customer_reviews.author: AnitaW, Los Angeles, CA.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Clean
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a water bottle that would keep my water cold but also not get that disgusting bacteria infested drinking apparatus situation after a month of use. I was so excited to find these and they work perfectly and because there is no lid to drink out of, less bacteria. You do have to use a special long brush to clean them but it is well worth it! Love these, have one for each family member!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Simple Modern Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Double-Walled Wave Bottle, 17oz - Midnight Black
feature_bullets: Vacuum Insulated: The Simple Modern Wave water bottle is double-walled and vacuum insulated, which keeps your favorite beverage hot or cold for hours
Premium 18/8 Stainless Steel: Bottle is made from high-quality, food-grade 18/8 stainless steel and is coated in a durable finish
Premium Copper Coated Insulation Layer: The exterior of the inner wall, in the vacuum sealed area, is coated in a thin layer of copper for added insulation
Take it With You: Narrow mouth reduces spills and sloshing while you drink; 9oz and 17oz sizes fit in most cupholders

Why Simple Modern: Our core principles of Generosity and Excellence have inspired us to sell high quality products, act as great partners with everyone we interact with, and give away a minimum of 10% of our profits

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars9,382 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
